attributes.action: Make mandatory installations of geothermal heating systems in all new houses from 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Geothermal heat is free, currently there is no incentive to reduce the high price of installation. A goverment backed drive would result in the reduction in gas / electricity demands to meet the Kyoto targets. The resultant reductions in the price of installations would make retrofitting economically viable when replacing existing systems and reduce the payback period considerably.
